template.name: Template App Sockets
template.description:
Monitor sockets on Linux systems - including TCP, TCP6 and Unix.
Requires zabbix-module-sockets to be installed on all monitored agents.com/cavaliercoder/zabbix-module-sockets[ For help and more information, see https://github]
